body_html: Why would we want to merge this before we get the full implementation? I don't really see the benefits. The changes are rather trivial, and I'm still unsure of your end plan, so I'd rather wait to see it fully and discuss it then (or it would be helpful if you could outline it somewhere).

body: Why would we want to merge this before we get the full implementation? I don't really see the benefits. The changes are rather trivial, and I'm still unsure of your end plan, so I'd rather wait to see it fully and discuss it then (or it would be helpful if you could outline it somewhere).
